name: Bearable
description:
This was made for the BTP Jam #3.

In this game you'll help Emma reduce her anxiety with the help of her teddy bear!

When the theme "Less is more" was announced I thought making a game around reducing anxiety would be a perfect fit. I've been dealing with quite a lot of anxiety lately, and this technique has helped me a lot. I believe teaching by play is one of the best ways to learn something; that's why this game teaches you the square breathing technique. 

This is the first game I ever made. I wanted to add a lot more options and maybe teach a second method, but this was all I could do in the week learning everything from scratch. 

All assets/music are made by me.
